mapper.sql: id, action_name, action_introduce, vote_ruler, host,vote_min,vote_max, action_image, telephone, status, visit_num,vote_sum, start_time, end_time
mapper.select: select va.id, va.action_image,va.vote_ruler,va.visit_num,va.vote_sum,va.vote_max, va.vote_min,va.action_introduce,va.action_name,va.end_time,va.start_time,va.`host`, va.`status`,va.telephone from vote_action as va LEFT JOIN vote_recommend as vr on vr.action_id = va.id where vr.action_id = va.id and type='0'

select va.id, va.action_image,va.vote_ruler,va.visit_num,va.vote_sum,va.vote_max, va.vote_min,va.action_introduce,va.action_name,va.end_time,va.start_time,va.`host`, va.`status`,va.telephone from vote_action as va LEFT JOIN vote_recommend as vr on vr.action_id = va.id where vr.action_id = va.id and type='1'
mapper.update: update vote_action set visit_num=visit_num+1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update vote_action set vote_sum =(SELECT SUM(num) from vote_action_detail where action_id= #{actionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) where id=#{actionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
